content:
CFS-SL SK Firestop sleeve kit Two-step solution for sealing cable penetrations requiring a sleeved opening ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Re-penetrable to allow future increases in cable capacity Compatible with CFS-SL GP Firestop gangplate Low VOCs to meet LEED™ requirements for indoor environmental quality Applications Sealing penetrations for single cables and cable bundles Ideal for small to medium-sized openings in walls, ceilings and floors Electrical, low-voltage/mid-voltage and telecom For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84): Flame spread: 10Smoke development: 15 LEED VOC: 4.9 g/l Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 10
Smoke development: 15 | LEED VOC | 4.9 g/l | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 40 - 104 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 104 °F | Temperature resistance range | 5 - 140 °F ### ITEMS- 2064271 - FS sleeve kit CFS-SL SK 2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2064272 - FS sleeve kit CFS-SL SK 4 - Package Size 1 pc - 3549776 - 50 CFS SL SK 2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 50x FS sleeve kit CFS-SL SK 2
